changelog.zh:
- 修复：Windows 播放页面上下键失效问题（进度条焦点冲突）
- 优化：EPG 导入改为异步加载，不阻塞 UI
- 修复：TV 端导入 TXT 后频道数量变为 0 的问题（文件存储改为永久目录）
- 新增：播放列表备份功能，导入时自动创建备份，向后兼容旧版本
- 修复：首页频道数量为 0 时显示白屏问题，现在显示操作按钮（添加播放列表、刷新等）
changelog.en:
- Fixed: Windows player up/down key navigation issue (progress bar focus conflict)
- Improved: EPG import now loads asynchronously without blocking UI
- Fixed: TV imported TXT playlist channels becoming 0 after some time (changed to permanent storage)
- New: Playlist backup feature with automatic backup on import, backward compatible
- Fixed: Home screen white screen when channel count is 0, now shows action buttons (add playlist, refresh, etc.)
